Legal Terms

What Information We Collect & Why To continue our research, improve Artificial intelligence technology ("AI"), provide, secure, and improve our Services, fulfill our obligations and reach our legitimate goals, we may need to acquire, receive and keep information which in some cases will include personal data.
With Whom We Share Your Information

We may retain Biometric data longer solely to comply with applicable Laws.
We will keep any Biometric data provided to us during the use of our Services for as long as the applicable user account is active, to provide the Services required by the user, unless consent for us to keep it is withdrawn, or the data is no longer needed.

When you visit our Website, we use cookies, which are small pieces of information that allow us to maintain your connection to our website.
